settings.text: We use cookies on our website to give you the best shopping experience. By using this site, you agree to its use of cookies.

settings.title: What is the minimum order quantity?
settings.answer:
Minimums are listed below:

E-Commerce Boxes: 1

Shipper Boxes: 1

Product Boxes: 25

Poly Bags: Contact Us

settings.title: How long is the turnaround time?
settings.answer: All printing is within 10 business days. Shipping varies on what you select but generally 2-5 business days. The normal turnaround time in the industry is 4-6 weeks. Fatbox does it much faster.

settings.title: How do I re-order my boxes?
settings.answer:
Within FatDesigner™, click "My Designs" and you'll see all your saved designs. You can Checkout with that same design from there.

For Fatbox Pro customers, you're B2B portal contains your order history can be re-ordered easily from there.

settings.title: Is your packaging recyclable?
settings.answer: You bet! All custom packaging is 100% recyclable and environment friendly.

settings.title: What is FatDesigner™ and do I need to use it?
settings.answer: FatDesigner™ lets anyone order custom packages with as little as 1 package. Simply select your package type and click the blue "Design My Box" button to get started. However for enterprise customers, we work directly with you one on one through Fatbox Pro.

settings.title: Can I get a custom quote?
settings.answer: Absolutely, if you are order 2,000 packages or more simply fill out the form on our Fatbox Pro page and tell us what you need. Otherwise, we designed a self service design tool called FatDesigner™.

settings.title: Is Fatbox meant for small businesses and start ups?
settings.answer: Yes we're a fit for both very small order and enterprise accounts. FatDesigner™ lets anyone order custom packages with as little as 1 package or up to millions with our Fatbox Pro program.

settings.title: Do I need to be a business to order a custom package?
settings.answer: Not at all. People hosting parties, weddings and birthdays have made custom packages for events.

settings.title: Are all Fatbox packages printed in the USA?
settings.answer: Yes, 100% of our packages are printed in the US. This means higher quality and much faster turn times.

settings.title: When will my order ship?
settings.answer: After an order proof is approved, printing will complete within 10 days and be shipped immediately afterwards.

settings.title: How is my shipping calculated?
settings.answer: Our shipping rates are determined by location and the total weight of your order. Shipping rates will be calculated and displayed at checkout!

settings.title: Do you offer bulk discounts?
settings.answer: Yes, all orders over 2,000 units qualify for our Fatbox Pro program and gain access to a dedicated account manager and more!

settings.title: I have a question about my order, what should I do?
settings.answer: Reach out! Email us directly at hello [at] fatbox [dot] com. We’re happy to answer questions about Orders, Order Modifications, Shipping, Returns, & Cancellations.

settings.title: When was Fatbox founded and why was it started?
settings.answer: Fatbox was founded in 2020 by two online entrepreneurs who made b2c products with a combined 20 years of experience. We know how hard and cumbersome custom packaging was to handle, and that challenge inspired us to start Fatbox!

settings.title: Are you hiring?
settings.answer: We're always looking for good help from account managers to back-end developers. You can send us an email at hello [at] fatbox [dot] com. You're welcome to submit your resume and we’ll contact you if we see a fit.

settings.title: THE LATEST
settings.text: Catch up on our latest articles and join in on the conversation!

settings.title: DESIGN & BUY CUSTOM PACKAGING.
settings.subtitle: The tech first packaging company. Design and buy in 10 minutes.

settings.title: What is the minimum size order?
settings.answer:
Our minimums order quantities (MOQs) are listed below:

E-Commerce Boxes: 1

Shipper Boxes: 1

Product Boxes: 25

Poly Bags: Contact Us

settings.title: How long does it take to receive my custom boxes?
settings.answer: Most of our packages are printed and shipped within 10 days.

settings.title: How do I customize my box?
settings.answer: Using FatDesigner™ you can add your logo, text, and patterns to make your own design. If you'd rather use a professional designer, contact us on the Get a Quote page.

settings.title: Is Fatbox meant for small businesses and start ups?
settings.answer: Yes we're a fit for both very small order and enterprise accounts. FatDesigner™ lets anyone order custom packages with as little as 1 package or up to millions with our Fatbox Pro program.

settings.title: What is FatDesigner™ and do I need to use it?
settings.answer: FatDesigner™ lets anyone order custom packages with as little as 1 package. Simply select your package type and click the blue "Design My Box" button to get started.

settings.title: Can I get a custom quote?
settings.answer: Absolutely, if you are order 2,000 packages or more simply fill out the form on our Fatbox Pro page and tell us what you need.

settings.title: Do you offer custom box sizes?
settings.answer:
For orders over 2,000 units, yes any size or material is possible.

However, for our low volume orders in FatDesigner™ we have a fixed set of sizes to choose from.

settings.title: Does Fatbox work with enterprise sized clients with high order volume?
settings.answer: Absolutely, check out Fatbox Pro and tell us what you're looking for. A package specialist will get back to you within 48 hours. We offer design services, package engineering, dedicated account manager and volume pricing for all enterprise accounts.

settings.title: Are all Fatbox printed in the USA?
settings.answer: Yes, 100% of our packages are printed in the US. This means higher quality and much faster turn times.

settings.title: How long will it take to receive my Product Box?
settings.answer: All product boxes are printed within 10 days, and shipping times vary 2-5 days.

settings.title: What's the minimum order size?
settings.answer: Product boxes have a 25 minimum order quantity.

settings.title: What is a Product Box?
settings.answer: Product boxes are small boxes to hold cosmetics, accessories, health and beauty products and mow. They are made of durable and lightweight cardstock, similar to a material of a deck of cards. Product boxes are retail ready to be on a shelf, but for shipping they need additional protection such as a shipper box or mailer box.

settings.title: Can I print on the inside of a Product Box?
settings.answer: Within FatDesigner™ we only offer one sided printing. For double sided printing and unlimited finishes, please check out Fatbox Pro and get a custom quote.

settings.title: Is the Product Box glossy or matte?
settings.answer: Our premium FatCard™ is matte be default, by adding our FatFinish™ it becomes glossy.

settings.title: What’s the benefit of using Glossy FatFinish™?
settings.answer: FatFinish™ will add a glossy layer to our premium cardstock. This will add a high-end shine and protect and preserve the ink and colors from the elements. If you want to add a protective layer but maintain a matte look, we offer other finishes within our Fatbox Pro program.

settings.title: Do you offer Embossing, Soft Touch and other finishes?
settings.answer: Absolutely but only within Fatbox Pro. For our self-serve customers using FatDesigner, our Glossy FatFinish is our only premium finish.

settings.title: Can I order a sample of the Mailer Bag?
settings.answer: We do offer a sample pack for $19 that includes one of each of our four products: 1 Mailer Bag,  1 Product Box, 1 E-commerce Box and 1  Shipper box.

settings.title: Are your Mailer Bags recyclable?
settings.answer: Yes! Our mailer bags are made from recyclable, low-density polyethylene, and is identified by recycling code #4.

settings.title: Is a Mailer Bag the exact same as a Poly Bag?
settings.answer: Yes it’s 100% identical. We call our poly bag a Mailer Bag.

settings.title: Can I print on both sides?
settings.answer: With Mailer Bags and a 3,000 minimum order quantity, yes!

settings.title: Do you offer other sizes or colors?
settings.answer: With 3,000 units or more, we have unlimited sizes and colors. Contact us through Fatbox Pro page for more info!

settings.title: What resolution should my artwork be?
settings.answer: We highly recommend a minimum of 300 DPI images.

settings.title: How much does a Mailer Bag weigh?
settings.answer: Our Mailer Bag weights 0.03 - 0.04 ounces.

settings.title: Do I need anything to seal the Mailer bag?
settings.answer: No, every Mailer Bag uses a self-adhesive strip that peels off and can easily seal the contents.

settings.title: What is the MOQ for access to Fatbox Pro?
settings.answer: 2,000 or more units

settings.title: What's the difference between Fatbox Pro and the rest of Fatbox?
settings.answer: Fatbox Pro is specifically for enterprise accounts with special needs. If you are ordering 2,000 units or more per month, you'll get full access to all our services, materials, and discount prices. For smaller orders, please use FatDesigner™ and enjoy our most popular custom

settings.title: Do you charge for die lines?
settings.answer: Outside of edge cases, we will not charge you for dielines or nickel and dime you with extra fees.

settings.title: What turn times can I expect?
settings.answer:
Since we are a US based provider, we can print most packages within 10 days.

Due to the nature of custom packages at higher volumes, there may be exceptions (material shortages, holiday timelines, etc)

settings.title: Can you do retail and display packages?
settings.answer: Yes we can handle any display stands or retail ready packages, as well as assist with design and engineering.

settings.title: What is FatDesigner™ and can I use it for my enterprise orders?
settings.answer: FatDesigner™ lets anyone order custom packages with as little as 1 package, and it's intended for lower volume orders (<2,000 units). Enterprise accounts can still use FatDesigner™ to create their design, but cannot checkout and buy. Simply save your design in FatDesigner and contact your account manager and they can pull the design for you.

settings.title: Request a custom quote today
settings.text: No package is too complex. Submit a quote for your packaging needs and talk to a package specialist today!

settings.title: What is a product box?
settings.answer: Product boxes are small boxes to hold cosmetics, accessories, health and beauty products and more. They are made of durable and sturdy card stock that come matte white. Product boxes are retail ready to be on a shelf, but for shipping they need additional protection such as a shipper box or mailer box.

settings.title: Can I print on the inside of a Product Box?
settings.answer: Within FatDesigner™ we only offer one sided printing. For double sided printing and unlimited finishes, please check out Fatbox Pro.

settings.title: What material do you use for the Product Box?
settings.answer: Our premium card stock in 16pt thickness through FatDesigner™ and we have many other options available through Fatbox Pro.

settings.title: Is the product box glossy or matte?
settings.answer: Our premium cardstock is matte be default, by adding our FatFinish™ it becomes glossy.

settings.title: What’s the benefit of using Glossy FatFinish?
settings.answer: FatFinish™ will add a glossy layer to our premium card stock. This will add a high-end shine and protect and preserve the ink and colors from the elements. If you want to add a protective layer but maintain a matte look, we offer other finishes within our Fatbox Pro program.

settings.title: Do you offer Embossing, Soft Touch and other finishes?
settings.answer: Absolutely but only within Fatbox Pro. For our self-serve customers using FatDesigner™, our Glossy FatFinish is our only premium finish.

settings.title: What is an E-Commerce Box?
settings.answer: Our E-Commerce box is made from corrugated paperboard and designed for storing and shipping your products. Using a self-locking flap, it’s very easy to assemble and requires no tape or glue to remain closed. Sometimes this package is referred to as a “mailer box”.

settings.title: What's the minimum order quantity?
settings.answer: With E-Commerce Boxes, our minimum is 1 (one).

settings.title: Can I order a custom sized box?
settings.answer: Within FatDesigner™ our box sizes are limited to our default options.  For unlimited options, see our Fatbox Pro program.

settings.title: How do I get customer inserts to hold my product in my E-Commerce Box?
settings.answer: That’s available with Fatbox Pro only with 2,000 or more units.

settings.title: What’s the inside of the box look like?
settings.answer: Our E-Commerce box comes in White Board (matte white), Kraft Board (natural cardboard) or Glossy FatFinish (glossy white outside / matte white inside). Whichever material you select for the outside will be on the inside, except for Glossy FatFinish™ which will be matte white inside by default.

settings.title: What is a Shipper Box?
settings.answer: Our Shipper Box is a premium corrugated paperboard designed for shipping your products. We recommend enclosing your products in a separate package that can be stored inside the Shipper Box.

settings.title: What's the minimum order quantity?
settings.answer: With Shipper Boxes our MOQ is 1!

settings.title: Is your Shipper Box recyclable?
settings.answer: Absolutely, our Shipper Box is made from paperboard and is 99% biodegradable.

settings.title: Do you offer different materials for the Shipper Box?
settings.answer: Yes we have 2 materials we offer: Kraft and White board. Kraft is the most eco-friendly and cost efficient, while white board offers superior colors. Note that any color on Kraft will look muted, similar to a colored pencil drawn on brown paper.

settings.title: What resolution should my artwork be?
settings.answer: Any images should be 300DPI or greater. Please note that on Kraft we recommend sticking with 1 or 2 main colors, such as black, white, or green. This is because all colors on Kraft will appear muted, similar to drawing a colored pencil on brown paper.

settings.title: Design templates to get started with fatdesigner™
